Question
========

The discernment (power) of a key is

Answerlist
----------

* The probability of rejecting H0 correctly
* The probability of rejecting H0 wrongly
* The probability of not rejecting H0 wrongly
* The probability of wrongly not rejecting H0

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The probability of correctly rejecting H0: Correct
* The probability of rejecting H0 incorrectly: Incorrect
* The probability of rightly not rejecting H0: Incorrect
* The probability of incorrectly not rejecting H0: Incorrect
